question: Which among the following Bill will not be lapsed , in the event of dissolution of House?
option1: Any bill pending in Lok Sabha
option2: Any Bill passed by the Lok Sabha but pending in Rajya Sabha
option3: Any Bill passed by the Rajya Sabha and pending in Lok Sabha Sabha
option4: Any Bill pending in Rajya Sabha & Not passed by Lok Sabha
answer: Any Bill pending in Rajya Sabha & Not passed by Lok Sabha
explanation: A bill which is pending in the Rajya Sabha or the Upper House of Parliament but not passed by the Lok Sabha or the Lower House does not lapse.
